title: The Convenient Suspect
description: A decoy culprit has been framed to divert attention from the real operation.

scenes.narrative: The suspect in custody appears to be the perfect culprit - all evidence points to them, but something feels staged.

choices.label: Interview the suspect to understand their side of the story.
choices.consequence: The suspect reveals inconsistencies in their own alibi that suggest framing.

choices.label: Cross-reference evidence with the suspect's known patterns.
choices.consequence: You find evidence that doesn't match the suspect's established behavior.

choices.label: Analyze digital footprints for manipulation signs.
choices.consequence: Digital analysis reveals fabricated timestamps and altered logs.

choices.label: This suspect is too convenient - look for the real perpetrator.
choices.consequence: You identify the actual culprit who framed the decoy suspect.

scenes.narrative: You've uncovered the framing operation. The decoy was planted to cover the real sabotage attempt.

choices.label: Confront the real culprit through diplomatic channels.
choices.consequence: The culprit surrenders information to avoid escalation.

choices.label: Gather irrefutable evidence before making accusations.
choices.consequence: Evidence compilation leads to a solid case against the real perpetrator.

choices.label: Use surveillance tools to track the culprit's movements.
choices.consequence: Tracking confirms the sabotage attempt and provides arrest evidence.

choices.label: The framing was planned before the crime - check exit routes.
choices.consequence: You discover prepared exit plans that confirm the shadow involvement.
